bibl.title: Engraved Gems in the Collection of the American Numismatic Society IV; Ancient Magical Amulets, an Addendum.
bibl.note: Supplement to: Frances M. & James H. Schwartz, Engraved Gems in the Collection of the American Numismatic Society: 1. Ancient Magical Amulets; - 2. Egyptian Gods, ANSMN 24 (1979) pp. 149-186 et pll. 34-40. - Catalogue. - Commentary. - Newell's Collection. - The Nine-Gem Hoard. - Avec résumé en anglais.
